synopsis.text: As pecting to strike it rich, Najimi Osana finds herself plunged into the intricate and demanding world of doujinshi, self-published manga, after witnessing her friend's financial success at a convention. Initially, Najimi struggles to navigate this unfamiliar terrain, but her passion for drawing propels her forward. Along the way, she encounters a diverse group of individuals, including her experienced friend Tsuyuri, her successful childhood friend Justice, and the supportive Sora, who all aid her in her quest for recognition in the doujin world. As Najimi perseveres through various challenges and awkward situations, she forms new friendships, rivalries, and gains fans, inching closer to her dream of making a name for herself as a doujin artist.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
